welcome.title: Welcome to PowerCowo, {{name}}!
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your coworking space
welcome.description: In just 3 simple steps, we'll help you configure your workspace so you can start accepting customers and managing bookings right away.
welcome.step1Description: Add your coworking space location with address, contact details, and photos
welcome.step2Description: Define desks, meeting rooms, and other bookable resources
welcome.step3Description: Set up packages and subscriptions your customers can purchase
welcome.note: Don't worry - you can always change these settings later

locations.title: Create Your First Location
locations.description: Every coworking space needs at least one location. This is where your customers will book desks and meeting rooms.
locations.action: Click on Partners to manage your location

resources.title: Add Your Resources
resources.description: Resources are the bookable items in your location - like hot desks, private offices, or meeting rooms.
resources.action: Add resources while creating your location

services.title: Define Your Services
services.description: Services are what customers purchase - like monthly desk access or meeting room packages.
services.action: Click on Services to create your first offering

tour.setupComplete: Your workspace is ready for customers
